ignore.reason: Empty element. Use for thematic breaks if appropriate.
Ending punctuation inside italics. Ending punctuation is only allowed within italics if the phrase is an independent clause.
Comma or period outside of double quote. Generally punctuation goes within single and double quotes.
Comma or period outside of double quote. Generally punctuation goes within single and double quotes.
Comma or period outside of double quote. Generally punctuation goes within single and double quotes.

Italics on name that requires quotes instead.
